body_html:
Awesome, thanks for the quick reply!

Added documentation and possibly a warning to unsuspecting users would be great.

Also, would it make sense to make output_size non-optional so this error can't occur?
body_text:
Awesome, thanks for the quick reply!
Added documentation and possibly a warning to unsuspecting users would be great.
Also, would it make sense to make output_size non-optional so this error can't occur?
body:
Awesome, thanks for the quick reply!

Added documentation and possibly a warning to unsuspecting users would be great.

Also, would it make sense to make `output_size` non-optional so this error can't occur?
